summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5959 for the improvement of Myrtle Street from East Marginal Way to Fox Avenue; and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 79545, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
